faqs.question: What do the services include?
faqs.answer: All our services include a personalized consultation, climate-controlled environment, ambient music, premium oils, and hot towels. Premium services include additional amenities such as champagne, private jacuzzi, and other specified luxuries.

faqs.question: How can I make a reservation?
faqs.answer: You can book via WhatsApp, our online form, or by calling directly. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance. For premium services, a 48-hour advance reservation is required.

faqs.question: What privacy measures do you have?
faqs.answer: We guarantee absolute discretion and privacy. Our facilities have private entrances, we do not share client information, and all our staff sign confidentiality agreements.

aboutPage.title: OUR STORY
aboutPage.subtitle: LUXURY TANTRIC SPA
aboutPage.description: Since 2019, we have been pioneers in creating luxury tantric experiences that transform lives and elevate consciousness in the heart of Mallorca.
aboutPage.story_title: A SANCTUARY OF LUXURY AND SENSUALITY
aboutPage.story_p1: At Tantric Luxe Mallorca, we have created more than a spa; we have developed a sanctuary where the ancestral art of tantra meets the most refined contemporary luxury. Our vision is to provide a sacred space where our guests can explore, heal, and transform.
aboutPage.story_p2: Every detail of our facilities has been meticulously designed to create an atmosphere that awakens all the senses. From essential oils imported directly from their places of origin to ambient music composed specifically for each type of experience.
aboutPage.story_p3: Our team is composed of highly trained and internationally certified professionals, committed to maintaining the highest standards of excellence, privacy, and respect in every interaction.

aboutPage.philosophy_quote: Tantra is not just a practice; it is a path to deep self-understanding and authentic connection with others. In every experience we create, we honor this ancestral wisdom while embracing the beauty of the present moment.

philosophy_points.title: AUTHENTIC CONNECTION
philosophy_points.text: We facilitate genuine encounters with yourself and others, free from judgment and full of acceptance.

philosophy_points.title: HOLISTIC HEALING
philosophy_points.text: We believe in the healing power of conscious touch and mindful presence to restore balance.

philosophy_points.title: CONSCIOUS TRANSFORMATION
philosophy_points.text: Each experience is designed to catalyze positive and lasting changes in your life.
